=== Homebrew ===

* `brew install`
  - Installs
* `brew update`
  - Update Homebrew
* `brew outdated`
  - List outdated installs
* `brew upgrade`
  - Upgrades everything
* `brew cleanup`
  - By default, Homebrew does not uninstall old versions. To see what will be removed `brew cleanup
    -n`
* `brew man`
  - Shows manual for Homebrew
